metadata.run_name: Mannheim Function Calling Benchmark - gpt-4-1106-preview Music wo/ Example Values
metadata.prompt: You are a helpful assistant. Answer briefly.

question_result.question: Among all the albums of Kanye West, return the album with the maximum rating. Return the answer in JSON format: {'album':'my_album_name'}
question_result.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of data based on a defined criteria (max. integer/float).

model_solution.answer:
It seems there was an issue retrieving the maximum average rating for the albums. I will attempt to determine the album with the highest rating manually from the provided data.

Based on the data provided for the albums 'Donda,' 'Donda 2,' and '808s & Heartbreak,' the album with the highest average rating is '808s & Heartbreak' with an average rating of 3.57.

Here is the JSON response:

```json
{'album':'808s & Heartbreak'}
```

question_result.question: Of all the albums of Olivia Rodrigo, please get the songs of her album released in 2021 and return the one with the highest bpm value. Return the answer in JSON format: {'song':'song_name'}
question_result.motivation: Evaluate the ability to find maximum value of specific attribute in the result.

question_result.question: Of all the albums released in 2000, which album do you think is not suitable for children and why? Also return the songs of this album. Return the answer in JSON format: {'album': [album_name_here], 'songs': [song_names_here]}
question_result.motivation: Evaluate the ability to make album selection based on desired situation using descriptors.

model_solution.answer:
```json
{
  'album': 'The Marshall Mathers LP',
  'songs': ['The Real Slim Shady', 'Stan']
}
```

The album 'The Marshall Mathers LP' by Eminem, released in 2000, is not suitable for children due to its descriptors such as 'vulgar,' 'hateful,' 'misanthropic,' 'sarcastic,' 'humorous,' 'violence,' 'drugs,' 'angry,' 'crime,' and 'aggressive.' The songs from this album include 'The Real Slim Shady' and 'Stan.'

question_result.question: Born January 5, 1975, American theatre, TV series and film actor has collaborated with American singer, Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta. There is also a film in the title of the song with this collaboration, in which both of them are actors. Can you get me the bpm of the song they're collaborating on? Return the answer in JSON format: {'bpm':'bpm_here'}
question_result.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand the context.

question_result.question: Taylor Swift's albums have helped many thesis writing students to maintain their motivation, there are a lot of posts about this on social media. I would like to investigate whether there are genres that help motivation. Can you bring the genres of the album with the highest rating among the albums? Return the answer in JSON format: {'genres': [genre_names_here]}
question_result.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand the context.

model_solution.answer:
I apologize for the inconvenience. It appears there is an issue with retrieving the album with the highest rating among Taylor Swift's albums using the provided function. However, based on the information we have, 'Red (Taylor's Version)' has the highest average rating of 3.54. The genres for this album are Folk Pop, Pop Rock, Country Pop, Singer-Songwriter, and Heartland Rock. Here is the information in JSON format:

```json
{'genres': ['Folk Pop', 'Pop Rock', 'Country Pop', 'Singer-Songwriter', 'Heartland Rock']}
```

question_result.question: Jaa kappaleen 'Sigue' toisen artistin nimi ja tiedot, paitsi Ed Sheeran. Return the answer in JSON format: {'second_artist':'name_of_second_artist', 'place_of_birth':'town, state', 'born_in':'YYYY-MM-DD'}
question_result.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand questions in different popular and unpopular languages (Finnish in this case).

question_result.question: I loved the song 'City of Gods'. Give me all songs released by the same artist ordered from older to newer excluding 'City of Gods'. Return the answer in JSON format: {'songs': [ordered_song_names_here]}
question_result.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand questions in different popular and unpopular languages (Finnish in this case).
